films.title: Godzilla vs. Anguirus
films.subtitle: My first stop motion film
films.description: This is a battle between Godzilla and Anguirus.  I have a feeling one of the two will end up in the water - but which one!?

films.title: Godzilla vs. Gyaos
films.subtitle: Godzilla faces the famous Gamera bad guy
films.description: Will the flying power of Gyaos be too much for the big lizard?  Only time will tell
